title: Watashi no Tame ni Nuginasai!
original_name: わたしのために脱ぎなさいっ!
sinopse:
The shy girl, Ninose Shizuku, is a high schooler who makes a living out of drawing adult oriented manga. Every day, in order to survive, she puts her heart working on it, until she encountered a certain problem...

(Source: Comic Cune, translated)
